title: Gartner Includes Everbridge in 2015 Market Guide for Clinical Communications and Collaboration
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 9:22 AM   Everbridge 
BURLINGTON, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Everbridge , a leading global provider of SaaS-based unified critical communications solutions, today announced that it has been identified as a representative vendor in the Gartner Report, “Market Guide for Clinical Communication and Collaboration.” The report serves as a guide for CIOs and clinical leadership to help clinicians increase team efficiency and enhance the patient experience. To perform in the market, representative vendors provide mobile platforms that can improve hospital operational efficiency and care quality. 
“Everbridge is excited to be named by Gartner in this year’s Market Guide for Clinical Communication and Collaboration (CC&C). We believe this mention reinforces the value of our secure critical communications platform and suite of applications in facilitating HIPAA-compliant care team collaboration that has the potential to improve quality care,” said Claudia Dent, VP, Product Management, Everbridge. “We look forward to continuing to provide solutions that can automate and improve workflows so that clinicians can focus on delivering care and improving the patient experience.” 
According to Gartner, Inc., “the CC&C market represents the convergence of legacy inpatient communications systems with nexus technologies (cloud, information, mobile and social) at a time when there is market momentum and real rewards exist for improved care quality and the patient experience.” 
In addition to providing healthcare communication solutions for on-call scheduling, code team activation and IT Alerting, Everbridge’s HipaaBridge™ secure messaging application is purpose-built to integrate with existing electronic health record (EHR) systems and enable efficient communication and telehealth for clinicians and patients. 
For more information on HipaaBridge and Everbridge’s critical communication for healthcare solutions, please visit: http://www.everbridge.com/solutions/healthcare/

About Everbridge 
Everbridge is a leading unified critical communications platform trusted by corporations and communities of all sizes that need to reach the right people for immediate action, collaboration, and decision-making. Connecting millions of people and internet-connected devices, the company provides reassurance that secure, compliant messages are delivered, locally and globally, received and responded to, no matter the recipient’s location. Everbridge is based in Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Beijing and London.
